name: CreateOnboardingRequestFreshservice
description:
Create a new onboarding request in Freshservice.

Use this tool to initiate a new onboarding request in Freshservice when setting up new employees or team members.

parameters.name: onboarding_request_payload
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the onboarding request to be created, including all necessary fields for Freshservice.

value_schema.description: onboarding request that needs to be created

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: onboarding request that needs to be created

value_schema.description: onboarding request that needs to be created
